channel.title: Shops ;)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img470.imageshack.us/img470/4262/helpbs6.jpg[/img]
That error i got now i trade with my shops.. And c Lost.. I use Testscape...
That i do in shops shop = 41 Barrow_Shop 2 2 4720 5 4722 5 4716 5 4718 5 4151 5 4724 5 4728 5 4730 5 4726 5 4708 5 4710 5 4712 5 4714 5 4745 5 4747 5 4749 5 4751 5
There is no bug in shop id!
That i do in client under } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true;
} else if (NPCID == 540) { //Barrow PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 41; //Barrow
So i go in autospawn and add spawn = 540 3253 3435 0 0 0 0 0 1 Al-Kharid Gem Shop
So i save and compile,go ingame.. now i trade with the npc i got c lost :S
Help :O

item.title: Shops ;)

item.description:
@Danish-Hax0r wrote:

That error i got now i trade with my shops… And c Lost… I use Testscape…

That i do in shops shop = 41 Barrow_Shop 2 2 4720 5 4722 5 4716 5 4718 5 4151 5 4724 5 4728 5 4730 5 4726 5 4708 5 4710 5 4712 5 4714 5 4745 5 4747 5 4749 5 4751 5

There is no bug in shop id!

That i do in client under } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop
PutNPCCoords = true;

} else if (NPCID == 540) { //Barrow
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 41; //Barrow

So i go in autospawn and add spawn = 540 3253 3435 0 0 0 0 0 1 Al-Kharid Gem Shop

So i save and compile,go ingame… now i trade with the npc i got c lost :S
